newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-WATSON NAMED EVERTON CARETAKER MANAGER.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-WATSON NAMED EVERTON CARETAKER MANAGER.

text.p: English premier league club Everton on Tuesday named Dave Watson as caretaker player-manager until the end of the season.
Watson, a centre-back, was hot favourite to be handed the reins until a big-name coach is appointed in the close-season. Joe Royle shocked the club by resigning last Thursday.
The move will increase speculation that Barcelona coach Bobby Robson may move to Merseyside at the end of the Spanish season.
Liverpool-born Watson joined Everton in 1986 and has helped the club lift the league title and the FA Cup. He has also won 12 England caps.
